trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Denton
There was one other sighting in Denton on or around January 20th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home with my wife Mary on McKinney Rd, heading SE from the intersection of Mayhill Rd, before making a left hand turn onto Grissom Rd, an large, chevron-shaped, glowing, amber colored object flew directly past us overhead, along our same SE direction of travel. The sighting lasted just long enough for us to look up through the front windshield and remark on it; approximately 2 seconds. The height and size of the object is impossible for us to properly determine. However, a rough estimate would make it about the size of an asprin at arm's length, and 1,500 ft in altitude. No noise was heard.
Summary: My wife and I were a couple of blocks away from coming home when we a large amber colored object flew by overhead.
